General.Name: NedSense Enterprises N.V
General.Description: NedSense enterprises n.v. does not have significant operations. Previously, it provided software solutions and services to furniture retailers and manufacturers, and the real estate industry. The company was formerly known as Blue Fox Enterprises NV and changed its name to NedSense enterprises n.v. in January 2010. NedSense enterprises n.v. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Vianen, the Netherlands.
